data.name: Rolling in the Maze-Patch
data.detailed_description:
In "Rolling in the Maze", players operate a small ball to challenge the maze. In order to reach the end, players need to crack according to the different level mechanisms of each level.

This is a casual ball maze game. There are currently 7 levels in the game. The mechanism of each level is different. Press "A" and "D" on the keyboard to control the rotation of the maze. Gravity moves, there are three stars in each level, get all the stars and reach the end to complete the game.

Game Features
7 levels with different mechanics
Unique spin control ball mechanism

About DLC
This DLC contains nudity. After finishing the game, you can activate the animation. DLC contains adult nudity.

data.short_description: In "Rolling in the Maze", players operate a small ball to challenge the maze. In order to reach the end, players need to crack according to the different level mechanisms of each level.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
